alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Southern Jasper; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:32AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, Tyler, Hardin and northeastern Jasper Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 332 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Huntington to 9 miles north of Votaw to 6 miles northeast of Crosby. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Lumberton, Jasper, Silsbee, Woodville, Kountze, Sour Lake, Colmesneil, Nome, Chester, Rockland, Warren, Town Bluff, Thicket, Saratoga, Ebenezer, Hamshire, Fred, Wildwood and Bevil Oaks. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 842 and 832. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Jefferson; Northern Jasper; Southern Jasper; Tyler
